messages.content:
It seems like there are a few issues with the generated adapter file `prayer_data.g.dart`. Let's try to resolve them step by step:

1. Remove the `part of` declaration from `prayer_data.g.dart`:
   Open the `prayer_data.g.dart` file and remove the line `part of 'prayer_data.dart';` at the top.

2. Update the import in `main.dart`:
   Instead of importing `models/prayer_data.g.dart`, import `models/prayer_data.dart` in the `main.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'models/prayer_data.dart';
   ```

3. Ensure the necessary imports are present in `prayer_data.g.dart`:
   Add the following imports at the top of the `prayer_data.g.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'package:hive/hive.dart';
   import 'prayer_data.dart';
   ```

   This will import the required classes like `TypeAdapter`, `BinaryReader`, `BinaryWriter`, and `PrayerData`.

4. Fix the `Hive.registerAdapter` call in `main.dart`:
   Make sure the `Hive` package is properly imported in the `main.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'package:hive_flutter/hive_flutter.dart';
   ```

   Then, update the `Hive.registerAdapter` call to use the generated adapter:

   ```dart
   Hive.registerAdapter(PrayerDataAdapter());
   ```

After making these changes, the errors related to the generated adapter should be resolved.

If you still encounter issues, please make sure that you have properly set up the Hive package and generated the adapter file using the Hive generator. You can run the following command to generate the adapter file:

```
flutter packages pub run build_runner build
```

This command will generate the `prayer_data.g.dart` file based on the annotations in the `prayer_data.dart` file.

Let me know if you have any further questions or if you still face any issues after making these changes.

content.text:
It seems like there are a few issues with the generated adapter file `prayer_data.g.dart`. Let's try to resolve them step by step:

1. Remove the `part of` declaration from `prayer_data.g.dart`:
   Open the `prayer_data.g.dart` file and remove the line `part of 'prayer_data.dart';` at the top.

2. Update the import in `main.dart`:
   Instead of importing `models/prayer_data.g.dart`, import `models/prayer_data.dart` in the `main.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'models/prayer_data.dart';
   ```

3. Ensure the necessary imports are present in `prayer_data.g.dart`:
   Add the following imports at the top of the `prayer_data.g.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'package:hive/hive.dart';
   import 'prayer_data.dart';
   ```

   This will import the required classes like `TypeAdapter`, `BinaryReader`, `BinaryWriter`, and `PrayerData`.

4. Fix the `Hive.registerAdapter` call in `main.dart`:
   Make sure the `Hive` package is properly imported in the `main.dart` file:

   ```dart
   import 'package:hive_flutter/hive_flutter.dart';
   ```

   Then, update the `Hive.registerAdapter` call to use the generated adapter:

   ```dart
   Hive.registerAdapter(PrayerDataAdapter());
   ```

After making these changes, the errors related to the generated adapter should be resolved.

If you still encounter issues, please make sure that you have properly set up the Hive package and generated the adapter file using the Hive generator. You can run the following command to generate the adapter file:

```
flutter packages pub run build_runner build
```

This command will generate the `prayer_data.g.dart` file based on the annotations in the `prayer_data.dart` file.

Let me know if you have any further questions or if you still face any issues after making these changes.

messages.content:
Code runs yet doesn't work properly. On the home page the bar graph showing total prayers overall is not visible. There is no number representing prayers left to pray on the left hand side and total prayers overall on the right hand side. 
In the edit page - instead of asking for incrementing prayers can you ask for percent completed for the year and update all the months and then if someone clicks on the year then they see the moths, otherwise they can add the average for the year. If they click the year it can open a new list of dropdowns for each month and that's where they can update the prayed and completed by adding a percentage. For a full month prayers for each of the five fajir thuhur asr maghrib and isha should be 31 for months with 31 and 30 for months for 30 
Then after they add the percentage you can calculate percent completed percent not completed 
Return only files that need to be changed

content.text:
Code runs yet doesn't work properly. On the home page the bar graph showing total prayers overall is not visible. There is no number representing prayers left to pray on the left hand side and total prayers overall on the right hand side. 
In the edit page - instead of asking for incrementing prayers can you ask for percent completed for the year and update all the months and then if someone clicks on the year then they see the moths, otherwise they can add the average for the year. If they click the year it can open a new list of dropdowns for each month and that's where they can update the prayed and completed by adding a percentage. For a full month prayers for each of the five fajir thuhur asr maghrib and isha should be 31 for months with 31 and 30 for months for 30 
Then after they add the percentage you can calculate percent completed percent not completed 
Return only files that need to be changed

messages.content:
When I change it for one year it changes it for all years, review the logic and be sure that when i update the month it's updated only for that month, and when i update the year it's updated for all of that year. also, for the current year it should only update up till the month before the current month
Also be sure the UI on the home pages is refreshed with each updated year count - log the current data in the hive with each change

content.text:
When I change it for one year it changes it for all years, review the logic and be sure that when i update the month it's updated only for that month, and when i update the year it's updated for all of that year. also, for the current year it should only update up till the month before the current month
Also be sure the UI on the home pages is refreshed with each updated year count - log the current data in the hive with each change
